name: Bite
description: Power is multiplied by 1.5 when used by a Pokemon with the Strong Jaw Ability.

name: Bullet
description: Has no effect on Pokemon with the Bulletproof Ability.

name: Bypasses Substitute
description: Ignores a target's substitute.

name: Can't Use Twice
description: Cannot be selected the turn after it's used.

name: Charge
description: The user is unable to make a move between turns.

name: Contact
description: Makes contact.

name: Dance
description: When used by a Pokemon, other Pokemon with the Dancer Ability can attempt to execute the same move.

name: Defrost
description: Thaws the user if executed successfully while the user is frozen.

name: Distance
description: Can target a Pokemon positioned anywhere in a Triple Battle.

name: Fail Copycat
description: Copycat fails if this is the last move used by any Pokemon.

name: Fail Encore
description: Encore fails if this is the last move used by the target.

name: Fail Instruct
description: Instruct fails if this is the last move used by the target.

name: Fail Me First
description: Me First fails if this is the move the target is about to use.

name: Fail Mimic
description: Mimic fails if this is the last move used by the target.

name: Fail Sketch
description: Sketch fails if this is the last move used by the target.

name: Future Move
description: Damages the Pokemon in the targeted slot 2 turns later.

name: Gravity
description: Prevented from being executed or selected during Gravity's effect.

name: Heal
description: Prevented from being executed or selected during Psychic Noise's effect.

name: Metronome
description: Can be selected by Metronome.

name: Mirror
description: Can be copied by Mirror Move.

name: Must Pressure
description: Has one more PP deducted for each opposing Pokemon with the Pressure Ability.

name: No Assist
description: Cannot be selected by Assist.

name: No Parental Bond
description: Cannot become a multi-hit move with the Parental Bond Ability.

name: No Sleep Talk
description: Cannot be selected by Sleep Talk.

name: Non-sky
description: Prevented from being executed or selected in a Sky Battle.

name: Pledge Combo
description: Cannot be redirected by the Lightning Rod or Storm Drain Abilities.

name: Powder
description: Has no effect on Grass-type Pokemon, Pokemon with the Overcoat Ability, and Pokemon holding Safety Goggles.

name: Protect
description: Blocked by protection moves.

name: Pulse
description: Power is multiplied by 1.5 when used by a Pokemon with the Mega Launcher Ability.

name: Punch
description: Power is multiplied by 1.2 when used by a Pokemon with the Iron Fist Ability.

name: Recharge
description: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot make a move.

name: Reflectable
description: Bounced back to the original user by Magic Coat or the Magic Bounce Ability.

name: Slicing
description: Power is multiplied by 1.5 when used by a Pokemon with the Sharpness Ability.

name: Snatch
description: Can be stolen from the original user and instead used by another Pokemon using Snatch.

name: Sound
description: Has no effect on Pokemon with the Soundproof Ability.

name: Wind
description: Activates the Wind Power and Wind Rider Abilities.
